title: Print write and comment into .gdbinit file
content:
Is there any way how to write comment into gdb file? 
b*0x1111 # break point at function
or 
b*0x1111 // break point at function
or 
b*0x1111 ; break point at function
That return an error . Or maybe is there a way to print for screen output like 
write('hi!')
or 
display('hi!')
doesn't work

comments.text:
For comments, try putting 
# comment
on a separate line.
